tool_input.new_string:
export async function researchInstagramProfile(
  username: string,
): Promise<InstagramProfileResearch> {
  const prompt = `Pesquise o perfil do Instagram @${username} e retorne informa√ß√µes detalhadas sobre ele.

Analise o perfil buscando por:
- Nome de exibi√ß√£o (display name)
- Bio/descri√ß√£o do perfil
- Nicho de conte√∫do (fitness, moda, tecnologia, gastronomia, viagem, neg√≥cios, educa√ß√£o, lifestyle, beleza, arte, etc.)
- Tom de voz usado nos posts (formal, descontra√≠do, inspiracional, humor√≠stico, educativo, profissional, etc.)
- P√∫blico-alvo (faixa et√°ria, interesses, g√™nero, etc.)
- Pilares de conte√∫do (temas recorrentes dos posts)
- N√∫mero aproximado de seguidores
- N√∫mero aproximado de posts

Retorne APENAS um JSON v√°lido com esta estrutura exata:
{
  "username": "${username}",
  "display_name": "nome de exibi√ß√£o do perfil",
  "bio": "bio do perfil do instagram",
  "niche": "nicho principal (uma palavra ou duas)",
  "tone": "tom de voz descritivo",
  "target_audience": "descri√ß√£o do p√∫blico-alvo",
  "content_pillars": ["pilar1", "pilar2", "pilar3"],
  "followers_count": 0,
  "posts_count": 0
}

Se n√£o encontrar alguma informa√ß√£o espec√≠fica, use valores razo√°veis baseados no que encontrou.
Para followers_count e posts_count, use n√∫meros inteiros (sem ponto ou v√≠rgula).`

  const text = await callKimi(prompt)

  const jsonMatch = text.match(/\{[\s\S]*\}/)
  if (!jsonMatch) {
    throw new Error('AI n√£o retornou JSON v√°lido')
  }

  const parsed = JSON.parse(jsonMatch[0]) as InstagramProfileResearch
  return parsed
}

tool_input.description:
## Problema
Quando o usu√°rio clica em uma postagem na p√°gina de cronograma, o modal mostra a imagem gerada em tamanho muito pequeno na se√ß√£o "TODOS OS FRAMES", tornando imposs√≠vel visualizar detalhes da imagem.

## Solu√ß√£o Proposta
1. **Aumentar o tamanho das thumbnails** na se√ß√£o "TODOS OS FRAMES" 
2. **Adicionar um modal lightbox** ao clicar na imagem para visualiza√ß√£o em tamanho grande
3. **Implementar zoom/escala** para melhor visualiza√ß√£o

- `src/components/schedule/schedule-calendar.tsx` - Componente do modal
- `src/components/schedule/add-post-dialog.tsx` - Dialog de adi√ß√£o/edi√ß√£o
- Poss√≠vel novo componente para lightbox

tool_input.content:
---
task: Consolidate VEO 3.1, Remove Seedance
status: in_progress
progress: 40%
last_updated: 2026-02-28
---

## üìç Current State
Consolidating video generation to VEO 3.1 only. Removing all Seedance 1.0/2.0 references (API n√£o dispon√≠vel).

## ‚úÖ Completed This Session
1. Identified carousel image rendering issue (user's browser vs Playwright)
2. Pushed social-media-manager to GitHub (commit: b80b364)
3. Decided: VEO 3.1 via fal.ai is the way forward
4. Started cleanup:
   - ‚úÖ Removed `/src/app/api/media/generate-video-seedance`
   - ‚úÖ Removed `/src/app/api/media/generate-video-seedance-2`
   - ‚úÖ Removed `/src/lib/laozhang` and `/src/lib/xskill`
   - ‚úÖ Removed outdated docs

## üöß In Progress
Cleaning up references in components:
- **src/components/content/video-generator.tsx** - STARTED
  - Removed model enum (was: veo-3.1, seedance-1, seedance-2.0)
  - Simplified to just duration: 4s, 6s, 8s
  - Still has lines 32-80 with seedance config to remove

## üìã Remaining Work
1. **video-generator.tsx cleanup:**
   - Line 32-80: Remove all seedance modelInfo references
   - Line 41: Remove selectedModel state
   - Line 74-80: Remove model routing logic
   - Line 156-161: Remove model selector from UI
   - Line 202-246: Remove conditional seedance UI

2. **Other files with seedance refs:**
   - `src/app/dashboard/video/page.tsx` - remove model options
   - `src/lib/ai-pricing.ts` - remove seedance pricing

3. **Consolidate to VEO 3.1 only:**
   - Simple form: prompt + duration
   - Single endpoint: `/api/media/generate-video`
   - Response: streaming video URL

4. **Commit & push**

## üß† Decision Context
- VEO 3.1 is stable, via fal.ai (FAL_KEY env var)
- Seedance 2.0 is not yet available via public API
- Better to have one solid option than multiple broken ones

## üéØ Next Action
1. Edit `src/components/content/video-generator.tsx` - remove all seedance UI logic
2. Edit `src/app/dashboard/video/page.tsx` - simplify to VEO 3.1 only
3. Clean `src/lib/ai-pricing.ts`
4. Test `/dashboard/video` page
5. Commit: `chore: consolidate VEO 3.1, remove Seedance dependencies`
6. Push to GitHub

## üìÇ Files Modified (not committed)
- src/components/content/video-generator.tsx (partial)
- Deleted: seedance routes, libs

---

**To Resume:** Continue from step 1 above - finish cleaning video-generator.tsx
